newsitem.title: BANGLADESH: Bangladesh to raise import duty on scrap ships.
newsitem.headline: Bangladesh to raise import duty on scrap ships.

text.p: Bangladesh Finance Minister S.A.M.S. Kibria on Thrusday proposed to raise the customs duty on import of scrap ships to 15 percent for fiscal 1997/98 starting on July 1 from present 7.5 percent.
"This will discourage production of low quality rods produced by re-rolling or melting scraps," he told parliament while presenting revenue budget for 1997/98.

He said the move also aimed at providing support to the billet based construction materials manufacturing industry. "This measure should improve quality of construction and is desirable in the greater interest of the country," he said.
